overview: In her Youth Kiera realized that she is attracted to women.  Kiera is waiting for a phonecall from her beloved woman.  They met at a party and now they have to decide whether or not they can start living together.  The waiting is long and tiresome, but all Kiera can do is just wait and hope.  She keeps asking herself if the two loving hearts will finally unite.
title: A Flowerbox for Rosie
